StoryText: I am going to my eccentric boss's place for a work party but my car is in the shop.
Question: What rental care should I pick out?

OptionResult.Result: My boss sees the green car and tells me geniuses pick green. %Pron:1:1% becomes impressed with me.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% is so impressed with my green car. %Pron:1:1% thinks I am some sort of genius now and spends much of the night talking to me.

OptionResult.Result: My boss immediately tells me that %Pron:1:1% doesn't like my car.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% doesn't like my rental car and holds it against me for some reason. %Pron:1:1% barely talks to me all night. However, I find an interesting philosophy book in the back seat which I read through later on and find $20 inside of it also! My boss may not like my rental car, but I do!

OptionResult.Result: The truck winds up being the same one my boss used to have.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% loves that I have %Pron:1:3% old truck and talks to me ALL night. %Pron:1:1% is even telling me that %Pron:1:1% is going to give me a promotion and a riase! This was my lucky truck!
